title: New Product: Hambini Racing Titanium Bottom Brackets
content: The cycling market is taking a hammering at the moment with a drop in demand, a massive drop in sales and general discontent. I thought it would be a great time for me to expand! More on this will be coming soon! Iâ€™ve started making some BSA bottom brackets (30mm and SRAM DUB/AXS) in Titanium....
